entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -10.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
